doc:
Gordon Collingridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gordon_Collingridge 0 Gordon Collingridge was an Australian actor during the silent film era. He played many matinee idol type roles, most notably for director Beaumont Smith and opposite Louise Lovely in Jewelled Nights (1925). Lovely called him "the male screen star to the manner born."He had spent a number of years working on Queensland stations. Gordon_Collingridge was an_Australian_actor during the_silent_film_era . He played many_matinee_idol_type_roles , most_notably for director_Beaumont_Smith and opposite_Louise_Lovely in Jewelled_Nights_(_1925_) . Lovely called him " the_male_screen_star to the_manner born . " He had_spent a_number of years working on Queensland_stations .
